Detailed Description

Class of an MDI window.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum KviMdiChild::MdiChildState

This is the state of the child window.

Enumerator:
Maximized  The child window is maximized
Minimized  The child window is minimized
Normal  The child window is normal

Qt::WindowStates  newState
